title: Rapid Prototyping-Based Programming Development Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience utilizing basic programming languages (Python, Java, etc.) and understanding of the software development life cycle
context.additional_context: Short-module, practice-centered learning via mobile environments for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can design a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) using prototyping tools within two weeks.
Learners can improve prototypes three or more times incorporating iterative feedback, reducing development time by 30%.
Learners can document and evaluate prototype-based development strategies aligned with real-world work scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
